field.name: video_categories
field.label: Categories
field.description: Select one or more videos categories (Ctrl + Click) to display in this video gallery.

field.name: video_order
field.label: Sort By
field.description: Sort videos in the gallery using one of these methods. If you are setting up a featured videos section, you can manage 'Featured Rank' via the JVideo back-end, and then you will need to filter by 'Featured Videos' (below) to limit the videos displayed in the gallery. This section only SORTS videos and does not limit what videos are displayed.

field.name: video_filter
field.label: Filter By
field.description: Filter videos displayed in your gallery using one of these methods. If you select 'No filter', all videos will be displayed (including pending and errored-out videos), so we recommend that you only use this option for building an administrator view.

field.name: video_layout
field.label: Layout
field.description: Style of video gallery layout. Grid view uses tables to display videos in a tabular format, and list view uses DIV tags.

field.name: video_layout_columns
field.label: Columns (Grid only)
field.description: Number of columns for video layout

field.name: videos_per_page
field.label: Max Videos Per Page
field.description: Limit number of videos per page. 0 = user configurable limit

field.name: char_limit_title
field.label: Title Limit
field.description: Limit characters in video title (0 = no limit)

field.name: char_limit_description
field.label: Description Limit
field.description: Limit characters in video description (0 = no limit)

field.name: video_target_itemid
field.label: Target Video Menu Item
field.description: Specify a target video menu item to associate with all videos within a gallery. Useful for maintaining module positions.

field.name: profile_target_itemid
field.label: Target Profile Menu Item
field.description: Specify a target profile menu item to associate with all authors within a gallery. Useful for maintaining module positions.
